data.name: Magicians And Monsters
data.detailed_description:
Story Background:


On the ancient Tianyuan Continent, there were three magic academies. They are the Imperial Spirit Academy, the Heavenly Void Academy, and the Fu Academy. Although these several academies checked and balanced each other, they always ruled the Tianyuan Continent together.

This is a story that takes place within the Imperial Spirit Academy. There is a Cold Ice Tower in the Imperial Spirit Academy, also known as the Xuan Ice Tower, which is the famous weapon of the founder of the Imperial Spirit Academy, which contains various monsters, and every second-year Imperial Spirit Academy student needs to go to the Ice Tower in the Academy to train and find their own monster companions.

The protagonist, Yue BuRuo, is a student of the Imperial Spirit Academy, and she has just entered the second grade when she receives the order to enter the tower for training, and the story begins here...

Gameplay:


1. Character cultivation: You can cultivate all aspects such as character attributes and spirit sword spells.

2. Monster cultivation: The game can accept monsters as their pets, and each subdued monster can be deeply cultivated, and up to five monsters can be released to assist in the battle.

3. 3D Combat: The game uses third-person combat, most monsters can fly in the air, and players can also fly with swords to attack.
data.about_the_game:
Story Background:

The protagonist, Yue BuRuo, is a student of the Imperial Spirit Academy, and she has just entered the second grade when she receives the order to enter the tower for training, and the story begins here...

data.short_description: Flying battles, controlling Excalibur attacks, taming monsters, land and air battles, experiencing a different magical journey...
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7/8/10
  • Processor: i3-9320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win7/8/10
  • Processor: i5-9600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
